mapper.insert: insert into com_boast(mem_no, com_boast_subject, com_boast_content, com_boast_count) values(#{mem_no},#{com_boast_subject},#{com_boast_content},#{com_boast_count})
mapper.update: update com_boast set mem_no=#{mem_no}, com_boast_subject=#{com_boast_subject},com_boast_content=#{com_boast_content}, com_boast_count=#{com_boast_count} where com_boast_no=#{com_boast_no}
mapper.select: select * from com_boast where com_boast_no>0 order by com_boast_no desc, com_boast_regdate desc
